thread.title: Lady Gaga 'replacing' Beyonce at Coachella after pregnant star cancels performance
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga 'replacing' Beyonce at Coachella after pregnant star cancels performance

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Lady Gaga 'replacing' Beyonce at Coachella after pregnant star cancels performance
text:
Showbiz Lady Gaga 'replacing' Beyonce at Coachella after pregnant star cancels performance It's been reported that the Bad Romance star will be stepping in for the Drunk In Love singer this year Share Will Lady Gaga be headlining the festival? Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Lady Gaga is reportedly set to replace Beyonce at Coachella in April. 
The Bad Romance star, who will be touring this year, will be filling in for the Drunk In Love singer on April 15 and April 22, reports Billboard. 
According to the website, festival organisers - who were keen to book another female headline performer - will announce the change in the next few days. 
Last week, Beyonce, who is pregnant with twins, announced that she will no longer be headlining the annual event in after being advised to "keep a less rigorous schedule," but will take to the stage there in 2018 instead. (Photo: AFP)
